newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was active at mid-morning, slow later Friday. Slaughter steers and heifers finished $1.00 higher than last week.

Inquiry and demand were good at mid-morning, fair later. Sales confirmed on 39,100 slaughter steers and 28,300 slaughter heifers. Last week's total confirmed sales as of 10 - 00 A.M. Friday, only 30,000 head including 18,100 head or about 60 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Steers - select and choice 2-3 1065-1350 lbs 70.00; couple pens with end cutting bulls 69.00; few select with end choice 1125 lbs 69.00-69.50.
Heifers - select and choice 2-3 1030-1200 lbs 70.00, pen 69.50; couple pens mixed commerical to choice 1110-1225 lb heifers and heiferettes 68.00-70.00.
